org.petuum.jbosen.row.int_

Class SparseIntRowUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.petuum.jbosen.row.int_.IntColumnMap
      • org.petuum.jbosen.row.int_.SparseIntColumnMap
        • org.petuum.jbosen.row.int_.SparseIntRowUpdate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntRowUpdate, RowUpdate

    public class SparseIntRowUpdate
extends SparseIntColumnMap
implements IntRowUpdate
    This implementation of IntRowUpdate assumes a sparse set of columns, ie. column IDs can be any int value. In general, this class is less CPU and memory efficient than DenseIntRowUpdate.
